posts.post_content: Poker great David Williams (also a fairly accomplished magic player) was disqualified from the 2001 World Championship for having 3 of his 4 a.c.c.u.mulated knowledge cards marked. According to judges they were bent slightly more than his other cards, making them easy to cut the deck to when shuffled. Among other things, it just goes to show how important card draw is to game tempo.
posts.html:

Among other things, it just goes to show how important card draw is to game tempo.
